name: Person Detection with Intel OpenVINO

name: AIoT, Anormaly Detection
description: Reducing the failure rate of trucks is critical in logictics business. That directly impacts profitability and customer satisfaction. Until now, logistics companies rely on regular maintenance to prevent the occurrence of failures. However, since the utilization rate of trucks exceeds the days what has been assumed to be covered by periodic maintenance, the percentage of post-maintenance caused by failures increasing, which has been a problem for some time.
